thread.title: Warning: Rough sea, waves up to 10 feet high in Arabian Gulf
thread.title_full: Warning: Rough sea, waves up to 10 feet high in Arabian Gulf

title: Warning: Rough sea, waves up to 10 feet high in Arabian Gulf
text: (khaleej Times) The NCMS has warned about poor visibility due to rising dust and sand. The weather will continue to be windy and dusty in few parts of UAE, the National Center of Meteorology & Seismology (NCMS) said today. The amount of humidity is set to rise during night and early morning. After slight to moderate rains over the weekend, the weather might be cloudy today. Moderate to fresh north-westerly winds will blow the sea and exposed areas. - UAE WEATHER (@NCMS_media) February 19, 2017 With dust blowing, the NCMS has warned about poor visibility. Residents are advised to be careful while setting out on the roads. - UAE WEATHER (@NCMS_media) February 19, 2017
